name: .ROZ File Extension
summary: Learn about .ROZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Schedule file created and used by aSc TimeTables, an application used by teachers to create school schedules; store schedule information such as courses, grade levels, rooms, teachers, students, school, periods, and days.

content: You can export ROZ files to a variety of formats such as .XML, .HTML, and .XLSX. The aSc TimeTables program provides a variety of capabilities to help teachers including automatic schedule generation, verification instruments, mobile publishing, and substitute teacher scheduling.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
